kpi_info.title: MAXIMUM PRXTOTAL
kpi_info.use: The maximum Rel99 received uplink power value during the measurement period. UPDATED:When the PrxTotal value received from the BTS is larger than the previous maximum value of the measurement period. If HSUPA is enabled, this counter is based on the PrxNonEDPCH value estimated by the RNC from E-DCH load factors and PrxTotal.
